snippet: Mayor Michael Bloomberg said that because of unsanitary conditions, the Occupy Wall Street protesters will have to vacate their home base temporarily for cleaning.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael Bloomberg said that because of unsanitary conditions, the Occupy Wall Street protesters will have to vacate their home base temporarily for cleaning.

headline.main: Protesters Told to Vacate Park, for Its Cleaning
headline.print_headline: Protesters Told To Vacate Park, For Its Cleaning
headline.seo: Protesters Are Told They’ll Have to Leave Zuccotti Park Temporarily
